title: Great Location (next to Santa Maria Maggiore) - highly recommended hotel
text: We would highly recommend this hotel as it's location is brilliant (only a short walk to Colosseum, Roman Forum and Palantino Hill) and about a 15 minute walk to Trevi Fountain and Spanish Steps. The d√©cor is a little bit dated but it is spotlessly clean. After a long day walking, you can make use of the hotel roof terrace overlooking the Santa Maria Maggiore. The hotel is also 5 minute walk from the main train station in Rome (connection to airport, and metro system). The breakfast is standard continental (no full English) and was very nice.
